Package com.scalar.db.sql.springdata

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScalarDbRepository<T,ID>
    Spring Data fragment repository interface for ScalarDB.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScalarDbDialect
    A SQL dialect for ScalarDB.
    ScalarDbDialectProvider
    An implementation of $DialectResolver.JdbcDialectProvider to return $ScalarDbDialect.
    ScalarDbExceptionTranslator  
    ScalarDbJdbcAggregateTemplate
    An extended $JdbcAggregateTemplate customized for ScalarDB SQL.
    ScalarDbJdbcConfiguration
    An extended $AbstractJdbcConfiguration to inject some custom classes to support ScalarDB SQL.
    ScalarDbJdbcRepositoryFactory
    An extended $JdbcRepositoryFactory to make $CrudRepository internally use $ScalarDbJdbcAggregateTemplate.
    ScalarDbJdbcTemplate  
    ScalarDbNamedParameterJdbcTemplate  
    ScalarDbRepositoryConfigurationExtension
    JdbcRepositoryConfigExtension extending the repository registration process by registering ScalarDB repositories.
    ScalarDbRepositoryImpl<T,ID>
    Default implementation of CrudRepository and $ScalarDbRepository interface in the integration of Spring Data and ScalarDB.
    ScalarDbRepositoryRegistrar
    RepositoryBeanDefinitionRegistrarSupport extending the repository registration for Scalar DB.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    EnableScalarDbRepositories
    Annotation to enable ScalarDB repositories.
